name: Gem Saver
description:
This Game was made for " 6wrni Game Jam 1 ", the theme is " Don't Touch The Ground ".

The idea of the Game :

The Player is holding a Gem however he can't jump while holding it so he must throw it and jump but he can't let it fall.

Warning :

  • There are totally of 6 level ( Tuto + 5 )
  • Please when you reach the end don't go out  of bound screen this will restart the level ( this is a bug i have fixed it but i can't upload the fixed version )

Assets :

  • The art is Adapted from Brackeys Channel video " MAKE YOUR GAME LOOK GOOD ".
  • Music and SFX are from OpenGameArt.
